1: שִׁ֖יר <sup>7892 </sup> <n>A Song</n> מִזְמ֣וֹר <sup>4210 </sup> <n>[or] Psalm</n> לְאָסָֽף׃ <sup>623 </sup> <n>of Asaph</n> אֱלֹהִ֥ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>O God</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> דֳּמִי־ <sup>1824 </sup> <n>Keep not thou silence</n> לָ֑ךְ אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תֶּחֱרַ֖שׁ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>hold not thy peace</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּשְׁקֹ֣ט <sup>8252 </sup> <n>and be not still</n> אֵֽל׃ <sup>410 </sup> <n>O God</n>
2: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> הִנֵּ֣ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> א֭וֹיְבֶיךָ <sup>341 </sup> <n>For lo thine enemies</n> יֶהֱמָי֑וּן <sup>1993 </sup> <n>make a tumult</n> וּ֝מְשַׂנְאֶ֗יךָ <sup>8130 </sup> <n>and they that hate</n> נָ֣שְׂאוּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>thee have lifted up</n> רֹֽאשׁ׃ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>the head</n>
3: עַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> עַ֭מְּךָ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>against thy people</n> יַעֲרִ֣ימוּ <sup>6191 </sup> <n>They have taken crafty</n> ס֑וֹד <sup>5475 </sup> <n>counsel</n> וְ֝יִתְיָעֲצ֗וּ <sup>3289 </sup> <n>and consulted</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> צְפוּנֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>6845 </sup> <n>against thy hidden ones</n>
4: אָמְר֗וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>They have said</n> לְ֭כוּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Come</n> וְנַכְחִידֵ֣ם <sup>3582 </sup> <n>and let us cut them off</n> מִגּ֑וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>from [being] a nation</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יִזָּכֵ֖ר <sup>2142 </sup> <n>may be no more in remembrance</n> שֵֽׁם־ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>that the name</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> עֽוֹד׃ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>more</n>
5: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> נוֹעֲצ֣וּ <sup>3289 </sup> <n>For they have consulted</n> לֵ֣ב <sup>3820 </sup> <n>with one consent</n> יַחְדָּ֑ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> עָ֝לֶ֗יךָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>Against</n> בְּרִ֣ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>confederate</n> יִכְרֹֽתוּ׃ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>they are</n>
6: אָהֳלֵ֣י <sup>168 </sup> <n>The tabernacles</n> אֱ֭דוֹם <sup>123 </sup> <n>of Edom</n> וְיִשְׁמְעֵאלִ֗ים <sup>3459 </sup> <n>and the Ishmaelites</n> מוֹאָ֥ב <sup>4124 </sup> <n>of Moab</n> וְהַגְרִֽים׃ <sup>1905 </sup> <n>and the Hagarenes</n>
7: גְּבָ֣ל <sup>1381 </sup> <n>Gebal</n> וְ֭עַמּוֹן <sup>5983 </sup> <n>and Ammon</n> וַעֲמָלֵ֑ק <sup>6002 </sup> <n>and Amalek</n> פְּ֝לֶ֗שֶׁת <sup>6429 </sup> <n>the Philistines</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <sup>3427 </sup> <n>with the inhabitants</n> צֽוֹר׃ <sup>6865 </sup> <n>of Tyre</n>
8: גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> אַ֭שּׁוּר <sup>804 </sup> <n>Assur</n> נִלְוָ֣ה <sup>3867 </sup> <n>also is joined</n> עִמָּ֑ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>They</n> הָ֤י֥וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have</n> זְר֖וֹעַ <sup>2220 </sup> <n>with them they have holpen</n> לִבְנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the children</n> ל֣וֹט <sup>3876 </sup> <n>of Lot</n> סֶֽלָה׃ <sup>5542 </sup> <n>Selah</n>
9: עֲשֵֽׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Do</n> לָהֶ֥ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>with</n> כְּמִדְיָ֑ן <sup>4080 </sup> <n>unto them as [unto] the Midianites</n> כְּֽסִֽיסְרָ֥א <sup>5516 </sup> <n>as [to] Sisera</n> כְ֝יָבִ֗ין <sup>2985 </sup> <n>as [to] Jabin</n> בְּנַ֣חַל <sup>5158 </sup> <n>at the brook</n> קִישֽׁוֹן׃ <sup>7028 </sup> <n>of Kison</n>
10: נִשְׁמְד֥וּ <sup>8045 </sup> <n>[Which] perished</n> בְֽעֵין־ דֹּ֑אר <sup>5874 </sup> <n>at Endor</n> הָ֥יוּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> דֹּ֝֗מֶן <sup>1828 </sup> <n>they became [as] dung</n> לָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <sup>127 </sup> <n>for the earth</n>
11: שִׁיתֵ֣מוֹ <sup>7896 </sup> <n>Make</n> נְ֭דִיבֵמוֹ <sup>5081 </sup> <n>their nobles</n> כְּעֹרֵ֣ב <sup>6159 </sup> <n>like Oreb</n> וְכִזְאֵ֑ב <sup>2062 </sup> <n>and like Zeeb</n> וּֽכְזֶ֥בַח <sup>2078 </sup> <n>as Zebah</n> וּ֝כְצַלְמֻנָּ֗ע <sup>6759 </sup> <n>and as Zalmunna</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> נְסִיכֵֽמוֹ׃ <sup>5257 </sup> <n>yea all their princes</n>
12: אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>Who</n> אָ֭מְרוּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Who said</n> נִ֣ירֲשָׁה <sup>3423 </sup> <n>in possession</n> לָּ֑נוּ אֵ֝֗ת <sup>853 </sup> נְא֣וֹת <sup>4999 </sup> <n>Let us take to ourselves the houses</n> אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n>
13: אֱ‍ֽלֹהַ֗י <sup>430 </sup> <n>O my God</n> שִׁיתֵ֥מוֹ <sup>7896 </sup> <n>make</n> כַגַּלְגַּ֑ל <sup>1534 </sup> <n>them like a wheel</n> כְּ֝קַ֗שׁ <sup>7179 </sup> <n>as the stubble</n> לִפְנֵי־ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> רֽוּחַ׃ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>the wind</n>
14: כְּאֵ֥שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>As the fire</n> תִּבְעַר־ <sup>1197 </sup> <n>burneth</n> יָ֑עַר <sup>3293 </sup> <n>a wood</n> וּ֝כְלֶהָבָ֗ה <sup>3852 </sup> <n>and as the flame</n> תְּלַהֵ֥ט <sup>3857 </sup> <n>on fire</n> הָרִֽים׃ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>the mountains</n>
15: כֵּ֭ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>So</n> תִּרְדְּפֵ֣ם <sup>7291 </sup> <n>So persecute</n> בְּסַעֲרֶ֑ךָ <sup>5591 </sup> <n>them with thy tempest</n> וּבְסוּפָתְךָ֥ <sup>5492 </sup> <n>with thy storm</n> תְבַהֲלֵֽם׃ <sup>926 </sup> <n>and make them afraid</n>
16: מַלֵּ֣א <sup>4390 </sup> <n>Fill</n> פְנֵיהֶ֣ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>their faces</n> קָל֑וֹן <sup>7036 </sup> <n>with shame</n> וִֽיבַקְשׁ֖וּ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>that they may seek</n> שִׁמְךָ֣ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>thy name</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n>
17: יֵבֹ֖שׁוּ <sup>954 </sup> <n>Let them be confounded</n> וְיִבָּהֲל֥וּ <sup>926 </sup> <n>and troubled</n> עֲדֵי־ <sup>5703 </sup> <n>for ever</n> עַ֗ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>and let</n> וְֽיַחְפְּר֥וּ <sup>2659 </sup> <n>yea let them be put to shame</n> וְיֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ <sup>6 </sup> <n>and perish</n>
18: וְֽיֵדְע֗וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>That [men] may know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אַתָּ֬ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>whose</n> שִׁמְךָ֣ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>that thou whose name</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>alone [is] JEHOVAH</n> לְבַדֶּ֑ךָ <sup>905 </sup> <n>you alone</n> עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <sup>5945 </sup> <n>[art] the most high</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>over all the earth</n>
